mapper.insert: INSERT INTO note(note_sender, note_recipient, note_title, note_content) values (#{noteSender},#{noteRecipient},#{noteTitle}, #{noteContent})
mapper.select: select note.note_title,note.note_content, a.account_id as sender_id from note inner join account a on note.note_sender = a.account_seq where note_recipient = #{accountSeq}
